description: These cheesy pumpkin scones are delicious simply served warm with butter for breakfast or an afternoon tea snack.
name: Cheese & Pumpkin Scones Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Sift the flour into a large bowl. Rub the cold butter in with your fingertips until you have a fine breadcrumb consistency.
Stir in half of the cheese and the pumpkin puree and mix well. Make a well in the centre and gradually mix in the milk to form a dough.

Tip the dough onto a floured work surface and roll out into a thick disc. Cut out into rounds, place on a lined baking tray and sprinkle with the rest of the cheese and pumpkin seeds. Bake for 20 minutes until golden and risen.
